item.title: Islamic Patterns (Regular Tiling)

item.title: Kaashi
item.description: Kaashi (Tile) The art of tiling has long been used to decorate homes and holy places in Iran. One of the masterpieces of this art can be found in Isfahan’s Sheikh Lotfollah Mosque. The purpose of this package is to create Islamic pattern using R functions. To generate Islamic patterns, we employ the Hankin method, as described in Craig S. Kaplan’s paper Islamic Star Patterns from Polygons in Contact.
